pageContent: Purpose: Radiation therapy (RT) for prostate cancer is commonly associated with erectile dysfunction (ED), although high-quality data on incidence of ED after brachytherapy (BT) are limited. We reviewed the literature on BT-related ED and propose a clinical pathway for maximal preservation of erectile function (EF) after treatment.

metaData.source:
[Andrological complications after pancystoprostatovesiculectomy surgery: utility of the bulbocavernosus reflex]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/8012425/
